AmqpSender
AmqpListener
ExperimentalListenersListenerAMQP
Listener for AMQP 1.0 end-points.
See also
Github - AmqpListener Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.messaging.amqp.AmqpListener
Syntax
Copy
<AmqpListener connectionName="" address=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
connectionName	text	-
Name of the AMQP connection in the amqp section of the resources.yaml file.
address	text	-
Set the address (name of the queue or topic) on which to send messages
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
sendReplyTimeout	number	30
Timeout in seconds for sending messages and receiving replies.
addressType	options	QUEUE
Set the type of address to which messages are being sent, TOPIC or QUEUE. For MessageProtocol#RR the type will always be QUEUE.
Available Options: TOPIC, QUEUE
replyAddress	text	-
If the adapter needs to send a reply message,
